abstract: The menu system that the menu builder modifies.
overview:
## Discussion

Always check the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuBuilder/system] property to determine which menu system the builder is modifying before you add and remove menus. For example, when you want to modify the main menu bar, check [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuBuilder/system] for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/main].

items.description: Gets the menu for the specified menu identifier.
items.name: menu(for:)

items.description: Gets the action for the specified action identifier.
items.name: action(for:)

items.description: Gets the command for the specified selector and property list.
items.name: command(for:propertyList:)

title: system
